original_title: Quiet American: Plumbing and Irrigation of South Asia
overview: This long awaited full length field recording release by Aaron Ximm (aka:  Quiet American) explores the fascinating sound world of South Asia's water  systems, from gurgling cisterns and water-powered grain grinders to water  pumps and various plumbing resonances. Recordings were made in  Burma, Nepal, Vietnam, India, Laos, Bangladesh, and China.
title: Quiet American: Plumbing and Irrigation of South Asia
